Global heat budget.q: Explain why there is a surplus of solar energy in the tropical latitudes and a deficit of solar energy towards the poles. (8)

Atmospheric circulation.q: Explain how atmospheric circulation cells and the associated surface winds assist in redistributing energy around the world. (8)

Oceanic circulation.q: Describe the pattern of ocean currents for either the Pacific Ocean or the Atlantic Ocean, and explain how ocean currents redistribute energy around the globe. (8)

Air masses.q: Describe the origin and characteristics of tropical maritime and tropical continental air masses. (6)

ITCZ.q: Describe the changing rainfall pattern between the areas that are affected by the ITCZ and the areas that are not, and suggest reasons for these differences. (8)

Formation of a V shaped valley.q: Explain the formation of a V shaped valley. (8)

Formation of a waterfall.q: Explain the formation of a waterfall. (8)

Formation of a meander.q: Explain the formation of a meander. (8)

Formation of an oxbow lake.q: Explain the formation of a oxbow lake. (8)

Drainage basin.q: Describe the hydrological cylce within a drainage basin. (8)

Hydrographs.q: Suggest reasons for a short lag time in a drainage basin. (8)

Corrie.q: Explain the formation of a corrie. (8)

Arete.q: Explain the formation of an arete. (8)

Pyramidal peak.q: Explain the fomation of a pyramidal peak. (8)

U shaped valley.q: Explain the formation of a U shaped valley. (8)

Ribbon lake.q: Explain the formation of a ribbon lake. (8)

Drumlin.q: Explain the formation of a drumlin. (8)

Terminal morraine.q: Explain the formation of terminal morraine. (8)

Esker.q: Explain the formation of an esker. (8)

Wave cut platform.q: Explain the formation of a wave cut platform. (8)

Headland and bays.q: Explain the formation of headlands and bays. (8)

Stack.q: Explain the formation of a stack. (8)

Sand spit.q: Explain the formation of a sand spit. (8)

Sand bar.q: Explain the formation of a sand bar. (8)

Tombolo.q: Explain the formation of a tombolo. (8)

Podzol.q: Explain the conditions and processes which lead to the formation of a podzol soil. (8)

Brown earth.q: Explain the conditions and processes which lead to the formation of a brown earth soil. (8)

Gley.q: Explain the conditions and processes which lead to the formation of a gley soil. (8)
